short_summary: new or used Truck for transporting pigs
description: acquisition of a new or used truck for transporting pigs
full_summary:
**RFP: Truck for Transporting Pigs**
=====================================

**Summary**
------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a new or used truck for transporting pigs. The truck will be used for delivery to Sherbrooke, Quebec.

**Reference Information**
------------------------

* Reference Number: WS4668251669
* Solicitation Number: WS4668251669
* Publication Date: July 3, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: August 19, 2024, at 14:00:00

**Solicitation Details**
------------------------

* The RFP is issued under the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
* The procurement method is competitive and open to submissions.
* The selection criteria are based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Contracting Information**
---------------------------

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User Entity: Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)
* Address: K.W. Neatby Bldg, 960 Carling Ave, Ottawa, ON K1Y 4X2, Canada

**Contact Information**
-------------------------

* Contact Name: Alina Cocieru
* Email: <alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
* Phone: Not provided
* Fax: Not provided

**Notice URL**
---------------

* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20208667?extsite=MjAyMDg2NjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
